mean_cn: n. 轻弹，轻打，轻弹声；  v. 轻弹，轻轻拂去，（翅）拍动，（旗）飘扬
mean_en: to cause (something) to fly through the air by making a quick movement with your hand, finger, or thumb
short_phrase: flick the small man with his finger
sentence: A giant finger tried to flick me away - I was scared!
sentence_trans: 一个巨大的手指想要把我弹开，我很害怕！
